title: How do I close my EzySave by Maybank account
content:
#### ADVISORY:

Bank Transfer to Maya will be right back! Our partner is working to restore the service as soon as possible.

If you want to close your EzySave+ by Maybank account, follow the steps below:

### **Withdraw all remaining funds**

Make sure you have withdrawn all the money from your EzySave+ by Maybank account. You canâ€™t close your account if you have funds left in the account.

### **Request for** **EzySave+ by Maybank account** **closure**

To request the account closure of your EzySave+ by Maybank account, please visit any Maybank branch or contact their hotline at **+632 8588 3888.**

For other inquiries or concerns, check out the following articles:
